core.title: Moox Core
core.shortdesc: Core plugin for all Moox Filament Plugins
core.description: This Filament 3 plugin is required by most of all Moox plugins, as it provides resources for categories, tags and settings as well as global configuration.

pages.title: Moox Pages
pages.shortdesc: Filament CMS, create and manage websites
pages.description: A headless (but TALL-stack prepared) Content Management System for Filament and Laravel. Manage pages, partials, contents, page templates and menus.

posts.title: Moox Posts
posts.shortdesc: Moox WordPress Posts, Categories and Tags
posts.description: A WordPress compatible Blog backend, providing access to Posts (Pages and Custom Post Types), Terms and Taxnomies like Categories and Tags and Custom Fields (with partial support for Advanced Custom Fields, like ACF repeater). Just import your WordPress database tables and start blogging with Laravel and Filament.

pulse.title: Moox Pulse
pulse.shortdesc: Moox WordPress Posts, Categories and Tags
pulse.description: A WordPress compatible Blog backend, providing access to Posts (Pages and Custom Post Types), Terms and Taxnomies like Categories and Tags and Custom Fields (with partial support for Advanced Custom Fields, like ACF repeater). Just import your WordPress database tables and start blogging with Laravel and Filament.
